Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District No. 3 -- 12 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District No. 3 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District No. 3 of West Baton Rouge Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of twelve (12) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $4,667,454 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public elementary and secondary schools in said District by providing funds for improving and maintaining salaries and benefits of teachers and other public school personnel employed by the West Baton Rouge Parish School Board?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Port Allen -- 5.27 Mills - CC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Port Allen Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Port Allen, State of Louisiana (the "City") be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a tax of 5.27 mills on all property subject to taxation in the City (an estimated $219,336.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax"), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collection and administering the Tax), to be dedicated and used for the purpose of paying the maintenance and operating expenses of the City Police Department?
